name: cypress-and-jest
description: Cypress and Jest both with code coverage running unit tests

scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:cy
scripts.copy:reports: cp cypress-coverage/coverage-final.json reports/from-cypress.json && cp jest-coverage/coverage-final.json reports/from-jest.json
scripts.combine:reports: npx nyc merge reports && mv coverage.json .nyc_output/out.json
scripts.report:combined: npx nyc report --reporter lcov --reporter text --report-dir coverage
